name: WarzoneDropperandChallenges
0:
”Alexa, ask War Zone where we dropping boys.”
”Alexa, ask War Zone for a challenge.”
”Alexa, ask War Zone for coordinates.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: war zone
des:
When you or the squad can't decided where to land, Warzone Dropper knows the way :)

This unofficial skill allows you to ask War Zone where to land through Alexa A.I.

Update: you can also ask War Zone for coordinates, great for less frequent locations.

Also the ability to ask War Zone for a challenge, more challenges soon.

Please leave feedback with a review or comment, thank you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
